name: Forbidden Knowledge
description:
Cannot use this card in Elemental Tuning, and only one copy of "Forbidden Knowledge" can be played each round.
Deal 1 Piercing DMG to your active character and draw 1 card.
descriptionraw: Cannot use this card in Elemental Tuning, and only one copy of "Forbidden Knowledge" can be played each round.\nDeal 1 $[K5] to your active character and draw 1 card.
descriptionreplaced: Cannot use this card in Elemental Tuning, and only one copy of "Forbidden Knowledge" can be played each round.\nDeal 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color> to your active character and draw 1 card.
